title: HintTileConfig
description: Config file for hint tiles location names and various tracker responses to viewing hint tiles

HintTiles.description: The list of hint tiles and their details

RequestedHintTile.description:
The response for when asking for what a hint tile says 
{0} is a placeholder for the hint tile text

NoPreviousHintTile.description: The response when trying to clear a hint tile despite not looking at a hint tile

ClearHintTileFailed.description: The response when trying to clear an already cleared hint tile or one that has nothing to clear

ViewedHintTile.description: The response for viewing a hint tile with multiple locations that are neither mandatory or useless

ViewedHintTileMandatory.description: The response for viewing a hint tile for a place that's mandatory

ViewedHintTileUseless.description: The response for viewing a hint tile for a place that's useless

ViewedHintTileAlreadyVisited.description: The response for viewing a hint tile with multiple locations that have already been cleared

NoHintTiles.description: The response for asking about a hint tile when there aren't any generated hint tiles (plando or no hints)

HintTileList.description: List of all the hint tiles

Name.description: Possible names for the hint tile

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.

AdditionalLines.description: Additional lines to be stated after the initial line. Used for adding additional poses.
